#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<string>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<algorithm>
#include<sstream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
using namespace std;

#define si(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define pb push_back
char A[1000];
char B[27];
char g[10];
int main()
{
    int t;
    si(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        gets(g);
        gets(A);
        scanf("%s",B);
        for(int i=0;i<strlen(A);i++)
        {
          if(A[i]==' ')
          continue;
          A[i]= B[(A[i]-'A')];
        }
        printf("%s\n",A);
    }
    return 0;
}
